timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: Since the test is about testGenerateDeploymentWithOldVersion, I thought that the n - 2 version should be tested. Have I misunderstood it?
replies.author: sgkiokas

replies.bodyText: You are right. The 2.4.0 probably makes sense here 👍
replies.author: scholzj

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/cluster-operator/src/test/java/io/strimzi/operator/cluster/model/KafkaMirrorMaker2ClusterTest.java b/cluster-operator/src/test/java/io/strimzi/operator/cluster/model/KafkaMirrorMaker2ClusterTest.java
index b77ed4b0a..38f8fbd7e 100644
--- a/cluster-operator/src/test/java/io/strimzi/operator/cluster/model/KafkaMirrorMaker2ClusterTest.java
+++ b/cluster-operator/src/test/java/io/strimzi/operator/cluster/model/KafkaMirrorMaker2ClusterTest.java

@@ -1249,7 +1249,7 @@ public class KafkaMirrorMaker2ClusterTest {
         assertThrows(InvalidResourceException.class, () -> {
             KafkaMirrorMaker2 resource = new KafkaMirrorMaker2Builder(this.resource)
                     .editSpec()
-                        .withVersion("2.4.0")
+                        .withVersion("2.3.1")
                     .endSpec()
                     .build();

timeline.message:
chore: Kafka 2.5.0 support

This commit:

- adds support for kafka 2.5.0
- drops support for Kafka 2.3.1

Signed-off-by: Stelios Gkiokas <Stylianos.Gkiokas@ibm.com>
